CustomField.description: A secondary approver for Expense Claims. This contact isn't automatically sent approval notifications however they can be sent, as a alternative to the primary approver, using the Send Approver Notification buttons on the Assignment and Expense Claim
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A secondary approver for Expense Claims. This contact isn't automatically sent approval notifications however they can be sent, as a alternative to the primary approver, using the Send Approver Notification buttons on the Assignment and Expense Claim
CustomField.label: Alternative Expense Claim Approver
CustomField.relationshipLabel: Assignments with Contact as Alternative Expense Claim Approver
